title: Game Scoop! 693: 10 Game Release Dates We’re Still Waiting For in 2022
description:
Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis,  and Colin Stevens -- are looking at games still expected in 2022 that don't have release dates. Next-gen The Witcher 3, Need for Speed, Little Devil Inside, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.

 

00:00:00 - Intro/What We're Playing

00:14:23 - 10 Game Release Dates We’re Still Waiting For in 2022

00:40:13 - PlayStation Plus Games for October

00:43:08 - Video Game 20 Questions
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis, Colin Stevens)
